reviews.review:
Easily one of the best games I have ever played...

The narrative and plot throughout the duration of the game constantly stays fresh and entertaining right the way through.
      If you've played the first game then you'll know about how the gameplay works, and if not then it's rather self-explanatory - challenging and intriguing puzzle-solving using teleportation in the form of portals. The idea is very unique and through the fluid and well-developed mechanics driven by Valve, it really makes for a special and memorable experience.
     There is also a strong sense of mystery regarding the world that Portal is set in - Easter eggs, secrets, and references about things like 'Doug Rattmann' and Portal's connection to Half-Life's world really motivate you to theorise endlessly.

10/10 from me. 

This is not just a video game. This is a story. This is a work of art.
Even after years of its launch, this game still provides tons of fun!
Please do a 3rd part please please!

Incredible story and gameplay. 
This game never gets old.

It's Portal 2. It's a lot of portal-based fun. Honestly if you haven't heard of it by this point, I don't know what to tell you.

Portal 2 is an amazing game. In Portal 2 you can complete a single player campaign, complete a co-op campaign, and make/play player made levels. Firstly, the single play campaign is an amazing experience to play (I don't want to spoil it). Also, the co-op campaign is also an amazing experience about trust (Again I don't want to spoil it). Lastly, playing levels that players have made is a great way to defeat boredom. In conclusion, Portal 2 is an amazing experience that a would definitely recommend to anyone who plays video games.

this game is very good i have a really bad laptop and this game runs really well the graphics are phenomenal i would recomend this to anybody even if you haven't played the first game

Хорошая игра по всем параметрам. Ну а,что ещё можно было ожидать от VALVe. Игра многогранная с запутанным сюжетом и классным геймплеем. Можно играть как в кооперативе так и в одиночную компанию. Иногда уровни бывают довольно заковыристыми и в некоторых моментах даже могут показаться не проходимыми. Но 10-20 мин стояния и размышления над дальнейшими действиями решают все головоломки!
가장 믿으며 함께했던 아군이 적이 된 순간,그 만큼의 공포는 없다

Vackert, stämningsfullt och lagom svårt. Ett kanonspel.
Playing it for a second time, they have added a lot it seems. Innovative levels, interesting storyline. Would recommend playing Portal 1 first though.

Portal 2 wonderful puzzle game about escaping a labratory filled with lovable robot characters.

pros:
Great comedy
well thought out story
lots of replay value
great charactors
it runs well on lower end computors
tricky and fun puzzles.

cons:
Build mode is rather limited
costumes for multiplayer mode are pricey.

over all i think its a good game and i would definetly recomend it.
